pages.text: $(li)The Enderiophage is virus-like creature that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/end/end_midlands)End Midlands$(/l).$(br)$(li)They travel by floating around the End searching any $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrade$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop a $(l:patchouli:utility/alexsmobs/capsid)Capsid$(/l) upon death.

$(li)When this creature finds an $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrade$(/l), it with infect it with Ender Flu.$(br)$(li)If you attack them, they will infect you as well.$(br)$(li)This effect makes the victim to receive a lot of instant damage after 10 minutes.$(br)$(li)This effect can be healed eating a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chorus_fruit)Chorus Fruit$(/l) before time runs out.
